system.description: As lesser restoration, except it dispels all negative levels and reverses level drains (restoring to highest level previously attained, if lost no more than one week per caster level). It also dispels all magical effects penalizing abilities, cures all temporary ability damage, restores all permanently drained ability points, eliminates fatigue and exhaustion, and removes insanity, confusion, and similar mental effects. Greater restoration does not restore levels or Constitution lost due to death.
